text: <!channel>: Profile and Settings comps are all up to date on Dropbox. There are only minor type changes, nothing major. Sharing comps have also been updated!
Can we get some groups for @groups for core and discovery? I like getting updates, but @ everyone is a little distracting
<@U0261PCRQ>: maybe we just stick to updating within core or disco channels?
is that a thing you can do?
Yes, you can create groups within channels
(which I can definitely do, but in this channel it would be calling out the same people that we have designated channels for…right?)
Not just within channels, they work anywhere!
<@U0U9WJB7F>: I think there's an advantage of for instance, letting core people hang in disco and vice versa but not be notified necessarily

<@U0HUKRME0> I was just talking about spec’ing with Phillip and we were wondering if what we’re giving you for iPhone 6 screens (in @1x increments) is enough to accommodate the transition between iPhone 5S, 6SE, and 6S Plus
Or will we need to remeasure anything for the way these other devices treat layout?
Well the plus can be treated completely independently if we want, but I think the current intent is to have it mirror the others, so if that is the case we shouldn't need any further details.
Great! I would say music to my ears, but this being text based I don't think that quite fits.
